comment.author: 8256808@N02
comment._content: This was taken in front of the Battery Maritime Building/Municipal Ferry Pier (Walker & Morris, 1909). Excuse my self-linking, but this is what it looks like now.

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Veterans of the American Civil War, and we'd love to have your photo added to the group. David
